description:
Dana has shot for many of our other sites. She wanted to be fucked by robots so badly, I couldn't say no...
Wow! She's quite a depth queen, and she's *insatiable*, even though she had a cold -- Watch her get fucked by the Predator, the MiniMite, and the Dragon. I had to put her in bondage and bring out the ALL NEW Annihilator before she had had enough! Also: the pussycam is back -- check out the outrageous quivering pussylip, screaming orgasm action in the MiniMite scene.
title: Dana DeArmond
